column4: Hey guys, i have a problem. When i plug my headphones in sounds keeps going out of the laptop speakers. I'm on a Sony VAIO and i read on the forums that it is a common problem with Intel-based sound chips. None of the solutions posted on the forums helped. Does anybody have another way of fixing this? It's really annoying
yes, i use alsamixer to change that
i tried alsa mixer, i tried the alsa configuration script (posted @ forums)
